title: The effect of electrolyte with binary solvents on improving the performance of rechargeable lithiumâ€“oxygen batteries
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01531A, Paper
Tie Liu, Wenjing Li, Guangwei Zhang, Aishui Yu
A bi-solvent electrolyte (G3/DMSO) was explored as a critical component to improve LOB performance from the perspective of electrolyte selection were rationally discussed. Cell capacity, coulombic efficiency and cycle life were all improved.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
